snippet: Months after ruling on the Hobby Lobby case, the justices will hear arguments on whether Arkansas may prohibit Muslim inmates from having beards.
abstract: Supreme Court will hear arguments over whether prison officials may prohibit Muslim inmates from growing beards required by their faiths.
lead_paragraph: Months after ruling on the Hobby Lobby case, the justices will hear arguments on whether Arkansas may prohibit Muslim inmates from having beards.

headline.main: A Prisoner’s Beard Offers the Next Test of Religious Liberty for the Supreme Court
